This website is dedicated to hosting review sheets and other material related to Cornell's core undergraduate ORIE classes, including:

 - [ORIE 3120](https://hentai.foundation/ORIE3120)
 - [ORIE 3310](https://hentai.foundation/ORIE3310)
 - [ORIE 3510](https://hentai.foundation/ORIE3510)
 - [AEP 4200](https://nhentai.net/search/?q=yaoi)
 - ...and more, perhaps, in the future.
